name: College Kings: Act III
storyline:
You and the gang are headed to Europe! It's the perfect chance to strengthen those bonds you've been making or perhaps make some new ones?
Field trips are never short of drama however, and this one looks like it could end up at a breaking point. With Wolves, Apes & Chicks all on the trip the clash of personalities is coming through. Maybe you could spend some time away from the other students? ;)
A new hookup app called Simplr is going viral back on campus, so it's time to find out how you match up in Europe...
It's not all love and romance though as you must have your wits about you and remember your fraternity training so far, you never know when you'll get a chance to prove yourself for the summer showdown.
summary: Sex, girls, parties, and power. As a freshman at San Vallejo College, you have the whole world in front of you - but it’s up to you to take it. Will you let the next four years pass you by, or will you lead your fraternity to the crown and become campus royalty?
